name: CreateProjectInWorkspace
description:
Create a new project in a specified workspace.

Use this tool to create a new project in a given workspace on Asana. If the workspace is an organization, provide a team to share the project. This action requires the 'projects:write' scope. Returns the full details of the new project.

parameters.name: workspace_identifier
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the workspace or organization where the project will be created.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the workspace or organization.

parameters.name: project_details
parameters.description: The details of the new project to create, provided as a JSON object.

parameters.name: include_optional_properties
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of optional properties to include in the response.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: pretty_output
parameters.description: Set to true for formatted, readable output. Use mainly during debugging as it increases response time and size.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.
